properties.description: Posted by Zygo99

properties.name: Amulet
properties.description: Posted by Zygo99http://www.northhobart.com/amulet/index.htm "This gorgeous Restaurant features artworks by emerging talent and it\'s menu adds another dimension to the food-scape of North Hobart. The converted Boot Store at 333 Elizabeth Street starred for a number of years as the highly regarded Mit Zitrone, and since then has continued to excite Hobart\'s keenest culinary explorers. The conscientious proprietors of this fine enterprise offer a detailed menu, which changes regularly to take into account varying seasonal abundances. It includes helpful wine suggestions which encourage further exploration. Just check out the LATEST menu and you\'ll see what I mean!" Amulet’s cuisine is influenced by the flavours of many cultures. Our philosophy of food including sustainability, seasonality and community are aligned with those of Alice Waters and Chez Panisse. We really do practice the ideals of seasonal cuisine and our menu constantly changes to reflect the produce that is abundant and at its best at any given time. We use organic produce and hormone-free meats wherever possible. Our suppliers include: Jacobson’s Meats, Yorktown Organics, Tower Farm, Shellfish on Bruny, Thorpe Farm, Pyengana Dairy and Rannoch Farm. Southern Tasmanian wines are also heavily represented on our list, with the focus being on smaller vineyards and producers. All of our cardboard, paper, metal and glass are recycled, most of our food waste is composted and we donate day old pastries and tarts to local charities. Links We Open at 10am EVERY day, serve Lunch until 3pm and Dinner from 6pm. The kitchen is open until 10pm 5 nights and until 11pm on Friday and Saturday. On the weekend, Breakfast is served until 3pm. home | about | map | W/E brunch | lunch | dinner | dessert | drinks | wine | pics | art | email 333 Elizabeth St., North Hobart Tasmania Ph 03 6234 8113 We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express and EFTPOS

properties.name: Eaglehawk Inn
properties.description: Posted by Zygo99 http://www.eaglehawkcellars.com.au/eaglehawk_about.htm EagleHawk Inn - Fine Wine Cellars have developed an online retail wine store to pass on great savings to wine enthusiasts like ourselves who are interested in top quality wines at affordable prices. We established our retail outlet in Tasmanian in 1986. Since then we have acquired a reputation as a stockist of fine vintage & rare wines and are also known for our huge range of wines at everyday low prices. Our online selection of wines will continue to grow and our wine specials are updated regularly, so please feel free to come and browse anytime. If you are looking for something in particular, but can\'t find it online, or if you have a general enquiry you can call (03) 6234 4921 or complete the online enquiry form and one of our knowledgable staff will help you with your enquiry. Eaglehawk Inn - For Every Occasion Wine Specials • Tasmanian Wines • Red Wines • White Wines • Sparkling Wines • Fortified Wines • Vintage & Rare Home • About Us • Contact Us • Buying Wine • Privacy Policy

properties.name: Fish 349
properties.description: Posted by Zygo99http://www.fish349.com.au/ Tasmania is renowned for the quality of its produce, particularly seafood, sourced from the pristine waters that surround this island state. Hobart, Tasmania’s capital is nestled along the Derwent River with an imposing backdrop of Mt Wellington. With many of its fine Georgian buildings lovingly maintained and a vibrant cultural community the city has an energy all its own. Housed in a landmark heritage building, in the main drag of North Hobart often referred to as the Lygon Street is the very stylish and contemporary 70 seat restaurant of Fish 349. The fit out is minimalistic, made up of hard-edged stainless steel, glass, and concrete, soaring ceiling, open kitchen, simple, clean lines of black in the tables, window benches and a large abstract mural. The restaurant serves local seafood, great fish and chips and gelati. The suits take lunch and talk business here. Families elbow the suits at dinner time and take in the action both inside and outside on the street, through the full length windows. Tasmanian wines and beers have been selected to compliment Fish 349 meals. This lively spot is becoming a must-visit for locals and tourists.

properties.name: Republic Bar
properties.description: Posted by Zygo99 http://www.republicbar.com/ One of the most popular Pubs in Tasmania. Café style, log fires, great fun for lunch or a night out. Popular with a large, loyal local following. Featuring One of the most popular Pubs in Tasmania. Café style, log fires, great fun for lunch or a night out. Popular with a large, loyal local following. Also with 2 function rooms and a beergarden with BBQ facilities.

properties.name: State Cinema
properties.description: Posted by Zygo99 http://www.statecinema.com.au/ The State Cinema is Tasmania\'s oldest operating movie house. Since 1913 this heritage building, with its intimate atmosphere, excellent acoustic properties and films of quality from around the world, has been entertaining generations of Tasmanians. Relax in our new fully licenced cafe bar with fine Tasmanian wines, great coffee & delicious snacks. P.O Box 467 North Hobart 7002 375 Elizabeth Street North Hobart Tas 7000 Ph 03 6234 6318 Fax 03 6235 2366

properties.name: Vanidols
properties.description: Posted by Zygo99http://www.northhobart.com/vanidols/index.htm North Hobart\'s Long Established BYO Restaurant. We will warmly welcome you to enjoy the friendly ambience in air-conditioned comfort. Savour the delights of our varied and extensive menu, suing only the freshest local produce. Open for dinner Tuesday - Sunday from 6pm. We accept most major credit cards and EFTPOS Starters and Soups | Entrees | Main courses | Dessert Banquet menus | Takeaways Minimum food charge of 5.00 per person. All prices include GST. If your favourite meal is not shown on our menu please enquire. BYO Corkage .00 per person
